dct_title_s: Official map of the County of Sacramento, California
dct_description_sm: compiled from U.S. Land Surveys, U.S. Geological Surveys ... by C.M. Phinney, County Surveyor ; drawn by C.L. Greene.
Shows drainage, roads, railroads, land ownership with acreages, ranchos, school districts, reclamation districts.
Includes table of distances, conversion tables, list of supervisor district boundaries, statistics, text, and "Map of Sacramento City and vicinity" (Scale [ca. 1:19,000]) with index.
"The Board of Supervisors ... do hereby approve this map and the same is declared to be the official map ... 30th day of December, 1910."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
